meanings.definition: A type of baseball cap with a flat brim and an adjustable strap at the back.
meanings.sent1: I bought a new snapback to wear to the baseball game.
meanings.sent2: He always wears his favorite snapback when he goes out with friends.
meanings.sent3: The snapback flew off his head when he tried to catch a flying frisbee.
meanings.sent4: Her snapback shielded her eyes from the bright sun like a loyal companion.
meanings.sent5: The snapback with the team logo was a prized possession for the young fan.

meanings.definition: A sudden rebound or recovery after a setback.
meanings.sent1: The team's snapback in the second half surprised everyone.
meanings.sent2: After the defeat, the team made a remarkable snapback in the next game.
meanings.sent3: The snapback from the loss was like a phoenix rising from the ashes.
meanings.sent4: His snapback in performance left everyone in awe of his skills.
meanings.sent5: The snapback in their fortunes was unexpected but welcomed by all.

meanings.definition: To return quickly to a previous state or position.
meanings.sent1: She managed to snapback to her original position after slipping on the ice.
meanings.sent2: The economy needs to snapback to its former strength after the recession.
meanings.sent3: He tried to snapback to his previous speed after slowing down during the race.
meanings.sent4: The company hopes to snapback to profitability by the end of the year.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's determination helped him snapback to the lead in the final lap.
